sentences.en: Some people use a very different tremolo the first string than when they move on thestring.
sentences.cn: 有些人在一弦和二弦上演奏轮指有很大的不同.

sentences.en: The introduction presents arpeggios on the harp against a string tremolo -- an enchanting sonority.
sentences.cn: 引子,在弦乐的震音上竖琴奏出了琶音,一种迷人的音响.

sentences.en: The sorrowful demeanour , the tremolo music, the long, explanatory , cumulative addresses, all were there.
sentences.cn: 悲哀痛苦的姿势, 如泣如诉的音乐, 长长的说明性道白使情节层层推进, 通俗剧的成份一样也没少.

sentences.en: The Strat’s spring-loaded tremolo system, which could alter the pitch of all six strings at once, may have caused the to guitar to go out of tune a little, but you rarely saw one break.
sentences.cn: 琴弦上装备的颤音系统，可以同时改变六条弦的音高，尽管会让吉他稍微跑调，但很少会发生一次中断。

sentences.en: The tremolo gives the impression of a sustained , shimmering note - a continuous thread of pure sound.
sentences.cn: 轮指给人均匀的感觉, 就象弦不断地发出纯净而闪烁的声音.

sentences.en: The tremolo harmonica is good as well, so you can choose any type as you wish.
sentences.cn: 当然了复音口琴也不错, 可以根据自己的喜好选择.

sentences.en: The tremolo is one of the most beautiful techniques of the classical guitar.
sentences.cn: 轮指是古典吉他最美的技巧之一.

sentences.en: Yet what is it about the tremolo which makes It'so elusive to students?
sentences.cn: 那是什么让轮指使学生们如此难以捉摸 呢 ?
